mapper.select: SELECT photoboard.b_no, photoboard.p_no, photoboard.user_id, photoboard.pb_title, photoboard.pb_content, photoboard.regdate, photoboard.pb_photo, photoboard.viewcnt, photoboard.recommend, photoboard.reportcnt, photoboard.use_flag, member.pic, member.nickname FROM photoboard, member where photoboard.user_id = member.user_id order by photoboard.p_no desc
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO photoboard (p_no, user_id, pb_title, pb_content, pb_photo) VALUES (h_b_p_no.NEXTVAL, #{user_id}, #{pb_title}, #{pb_content}, #{pb_photo})
